markdownRemark.html:
AWS Training for Comprehend

NLP Problem

  • main thing that you need to do is to gather the data.
  • you need to know what channels to go to
  • get the data
  • pull the data
  • build the model (process the data)
  • annotate the data sets (label - machine learning terms) annotate words

comprehend you don’t need to think about machines.

5 things that comprhend can do

  1. Sentiment - analyze tweets and whether the sentiment is positive or not
  2. Entities -
  3. Languages - analyze the language that the data is int
  4. Key phrases
  5. topic modeling - pull together custom topic by feeding the model information

powered by deep learning

KEY FEATURES

  1. Text Analysis
  2. Topic Modeling
  3. Comprehend Custom
  4. custom classification - build your own model
  5. Custom entity recognition - identifies new entity types — bring your own documents — use to run text analysis

DEMO

  1. go to management console
  2. go to comprhend
  3. analysis jobs
  4. create job
  5. give it a name
  6. type - topic modeling
  7. s3 - location
  8. specify the output location

Realtime text analytics and sentiment analysis

twitter > aws kinesis data firehose > s3

s3> aws lambda > amazon comprehend s3> aws athena > amazon quicksight
